title: 有关新boss"凋灵"的召唤方法
author: zdyxiaokeai转世
txt_content:
维基上说Withers can now be spawned since snapshot 12w36aIt will be possible to spawn Withers by arranging skeleton heads in some way.
那么有谁试出来怎么摆骷髅头能召唤wither了吗,我想在12w36a里撸一发尝鲜

replies.author: jjcraft
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 jjcraft 于 2012-9-6 22:01 编辑 

http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wik ... evelopment_versions
自己看吧就在更新条目的顶端
还有合成烽火台的关键要素nether star还是这货掉的- -
单人基本不可能完成

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content:
Place 4 pieces of Soulsand vertically in a T-shape and place 3 Wither Skeleton Skulls on top to create it.
……
就是说把灵魂沙摆成像铁傀儡那样的T形状然后上面摆3个骷髅头

replies.author: zdyxiaokeai转世
replies.txt_content:
sylqiuyifeng 发表于 2012-9-6 22:00 
Place 4 pieces of Soulsand vertically in a T-shape and place 3 Wither Skeleton Skulls on top to crea ...
非常感谢,我现在就去试试

replies.author: sjjklh
replies.txt_content:
攻击一切有生命的生物

也就是说

不攻击亡灵

replies.author: indeed
replies.txt_content: 总觉得这东西弄出来打死也没什么很大的奖励

replies.author: Danny仔
replies.txt_content: 弄完這東西牠會立即攻擊嗎?

replies.author: zdyxiaokeai转世
replies.txt_content:
Danny仔 发表于 2012-9-7 00:18 
弄完這東西牠會立即攻擊嗎?
他出现的时候是空血,然后以蛮快的速度原地回满血后就开始攻击了
